description: I'm Rui. I'm a Industrial Electrician.

I am currently working at the
{{company}}

in
{{location}}.
However I have total and immediate availability to start working.
I have excellent knowledge of Electricity, Pneumatics, Hydraulics, Interpretation of schematics, Informatics in the user's perspective, as well as in the use of internet.
My strengths are Electrification of electrical boards and structures, Industrial maintenance and repair.
I also have experience in industrial automation and electromechanical.
I have good team work spirit, cooperative and with a taste for knowledge and learning.
I have preference in working as an industrial electrician, but I do not exclude the possibility of performing another position in different areas.
Looking forward to hearing from you.

description.title: Industrial Electrician
description.functionsPerformed: Find machine problems and fix, install cable ducts, pass cables, connect electrical boards, replace plugs, lamps, switches, mechanics basic.

description.title: Cold technician
description.functionsPerformed: Repair and maintenance of cold containers,"PTI", copper welding and replacement of motors and sensors.

description.title: Industrial Electrician
description.functionsPerformed: Repair of industrial machines (electrical and electromechanical), elaboration and electrification of electrical boards, electrical assembly of machines and structures of transport of cork and beginner of programming and automation of PLC (OMRON).
description.skillsGained: Repairing, construction, development and analytical skills.

description.title: Electronic, automation and maintenance (1500 hours Internship)
description.functionsPerformed: Repair and maintenance of home appliances.
description.skillsGained: Communication, engines, repairing and selling skills.

description.title: Home Assistant
description.description: My house is controlled by a Raspberry PI 4 and automated with "Home Assistant". I can control lights, sensors, robots, both internally (without internet connection) and externally (via VPN "Tailscale" and IP masked by "Duck DNS").
